comment: If M is the midpoint of AB, AQ = BQ, and P is on the line AB, then QMP is a right angle. This is proven by reduction to the special case ~ chordthmlem , where P = B, and using ~ angrtmuld to observe that QMP is right iff QMB is. (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
